item.title: Album Digest, March 2011
item.description: This is not an Album Digest March 2011 Well as I said at the end of last monthâ€™s album digest post, I took a bit of a break from pursuing new music quite as closely as I have been. As promised, I sidestepped the new R.E.M. and Elbow albums - although I had been promised the latter as a birthday present it is yet to show up, maybe I will look at in April.
